column5: Glen, I would just be happy to be out in a boat let alone catch anything Oh ya...nice sweater.......  Tight Lines !!
For a second I didn't recognize you with your sweater on GCD.  Nice to see someone got out fishing today and caught some fish too.

Nice report Glen and it sure looks warm unless you have started to become less effected by the cold like a canadian.What are the bigger fish in your Lake?Oh and one more thing I don't think I have ever seen you in one report without sunglasses.It was not me who voted about the deep tan lines in the New years resolution thread.I am curious are you hiding some tan lines Glen?Happy New Year .Take care of your Dad.Mike
Great news Glen. By the way, best I've ever seen you dressed.
Good to see ya out Glen! Glad to hear your dad is doing alright!  Whopper
That looks like the sweater my grandma knitted for my grandpa back in the late 80's  Nice report
